name: lax
description: A modular JS library for lazy data manipulation.

scripts.lint: jshint make.js src test && jscs make.js src test
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run cover && npm run check_coverage
scripts.cover: node make.js clean && babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --recursive test

author: Jeff McRiffey
